kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
> Whether XByK is even the best place for something like that is certainly a good question
Yeah, we focus features that enable easy content reuse _within_ Xperience and across various channel types vs "export everything" features.
But, this is reasonable use case and like a great motivation for a team to build [a small custom app in Xperience](https://docs.kentico.com/x/04ouCw) which lists recently uploaded content item assets & their URLs and then lets a marketer export the content item, asset, and URL values in bulk.
If you want an example of adding csv exporting to a listing page, [check out the Kentico Community Portal example for form submissions](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.4.1.5/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Features/Forms/FormSubmissionsTabExtender.cs#L71).
